verbs.description: [ARG1: Cohen] [V: is] [ARG2: under federal criminal investigation for , among other things , a $ 130,000 payment to the porn star Stormy Daniels in exchange for her silence about an alleged affair with President Trump in 2006] .

Cohen is under federal criminal investigation for , among other things , a $ 130,000 payment to the porn star Stormy Daniels in exchange for her silence about an [V: alleged] [ARG1: affair] with President Trump in 2006 .
